item.title: RealWorldCTF22
item.description: Hack into Skynet Hack into skynet to save the world, which way do you prefer? Target: 47.242.21.212:8081-8086/TCP Source Code Looking through the websites source code, we can see that there are 10 different functions, only a handful are relevant though. skynet_detect This function is called by everyone endpoint, collects all the request information, and sends it to a filter library do_login Logs in with a username and password
